author: Amanda Yeo
title: 'This is sociopathic': Seth Meyers blasts Trump's plan to end coronavirus lockdown by Easter
description: The coronavirus pandemic continues to keep countries in lockdown, with over 400,000 confirmed cases around the globe. Medical experts are warning that social distancing is pivotal to slowing the spread of the virus, which would put less strain on overburdened…
